original_text: Caleb had a slave wife called Ephah. She gave birth to Haran, Moza and Gazez. Haran became the father of Gazez.
korean_text: 갈렙의 소실 에바는 하란과 모사와 가세스를 낳고 하란은 가세스를 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: Caleb had a slave wife called Ephah
sentences.korean_translation: 갈레브는 에바라 불리는 노예 아내를 두었었으며

sentences.original_text: Haran became the father of Gazez
